# rui_utils

## Installation

> [!IMPORTANT]
> Requires Python >= 3.10 and CUDA-enabled GPU (CPU-only device is not recommended).

We recommend to install `rui_utils` to a new venv.

```sh
uv venv
uv pip install rui_utils[rapids, torch]
```
